title: Evolved Morality, Weinstein Gnosticism and why God #2 Always Wins
description:
What is our source of morality? Religious (s) people like to say it is a (conscious, all seeing, personal) God with opinions and preferences. Atheists like to imagine there is an "objective morality" as if morality were something like a banana or a car. It's not hard realizing how morality evolves, the harder question is "what is it?" or "what is it for?"
